title: Google Pixel 3 won't open certain apps
content: Suddenly my Pixel 3 won't open certain apps. The Google Assistant is not working. When I try to start the app it opens and quickly closes. I thought maybe it was an issue with my Microsoft email (it wouldn't stay open either) so I uninstalled it. When I try to reinstall it the message is "something went wrong, try again". There is a message when I try to start Assistant "Account Action Required - Fix" but when I try to "fix" it just disappears. I found this is happening with several apps now. I am losing my mind!
